name: A bird in hand is worth hundreds in the bush
name_original: A bird in hand is worth hundreds in the bush
description:
The world is in danger! Aleksander Mikael, a mad scientific, wants to rule over the world!

You're part of the Omega platoon, tasked with locating and killing Aleksander. Help save the world...

Known bugs

  • The fog of the game over screen on the web version doesn't work properly, it doesn't happen in the desktop version
